txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Craft a jewelled coin for the refugees of Wildermore ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A skilled jeweller such as yourself can help the refugees of Wildermore by crafting a jewelled coin for them.

'Many people are destitute after the destruction of NÃºrzum came to Wildermore. As a jeweller, do you think you could craft something valuable to donate to them, for the people to spend on necessities when in a pinch?\n\n'Any contribution you could make would be helpful to these folk. Many have nothing at all since the invasion.'
Hildelith has given you a recipe for a jewelled coin.\n\nYou should craft a jewelled coin for the impoverished refugees at Forlaw.
'Ah! This will help fill the pockets of the poor. Excellent handiwork, [placeholder]; I thank you for this donation.'
Deliver the jewelled coin to Hildelith
Hildelith is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have crafted a jewelled coin, and should now deliver it to Hildelith.
